Learnloot: A math game

But a lot more...

What sets apart from so many math games on the market is that we make our money without putting gameplay and education behind a paywall.

We're entirely open-source and we're led by students that are trying to revolutinize online learning.

We are currently in the process of developing our final art and code. Our storyline and concept art is mostly complete.
